titles.title: Medicare Safe Needle Disposal Coverage Act of 2011

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage, as supplies associated with the injection of insulin, of containment, removal, decontamination and disposal of home-generated needles, syringes, and other sharps through a sharp container, decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar program under part D of the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
